attributes.action: Reduce the N.Insurance stamp to reflect the fact that any contributions will not guarantee a pension if the law changes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We currently pay National Insurance to cover our state pension funds and to pay for our National Health Service.

Gordon Brown has proposed that our state pension be phased out leaving people who are not retiring imminently with little or no security for the future.
